mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SURVEY_ANXIETY ( USER_ID, REG_DATE, TEXT_1, TEXT_2, TEXT_3, TEXT_4, TEXT_5, TEXT_6, TEXT_7, TEXT_8, TEXT_9, TEXT_10, TEXT_11, TEXT_12, TEXT_13, TEXT_14, TEXT_15, TEXT_16, TEXT_17, TEXT_18, TEXT_19, TEXT_20, TEXT_21 ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, NOW(), #{text_1}, #{text_2}, #{text_3}, #{text_4}, #{text_5}, #{text_6}, #{text_7}, #{text_8}, #{text_9}, #{text_10}, #{text_11}, #{text_12}, #{text_13}, #{text_14}, #{text_15}, #{text_16}, #{text_17}, #{text_18}, #{text_19}, #{text_20}, #{text_21} )
